name: when-stuck
description: A dispatch system to identify and apply the correct problem-solving technique based on the specific type of roadblock encountered.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: stuck
commands.description: Identify which problem-solving skill to use when stuck.
commands.prompt: You are stuck. Analyze your current roadblock and determine which specialized problem-solving technique (simplification, meta-patterns, inversion, systematic debugging, etc.) is most appropriate to resolve it.
